ygData.subject: RE: Re: lvl 29 pet spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail. Just a reminder. They will always have the pet spells for level 29 and below somewhere for sale in the game as shadow knights need them and they do not
ygData.messageBody:
Hail.

Just a reminder. They will always have the pet spells for level 29 and below
somewhere for sale in the game as shadow knights need them and they do not
get research. So there will always be a non research way to get them in
game. I had my gnome buy my lev 29 pet a few days ago and it cost him 18
platinum and some change and was in the OOT on the high elf vendor that wont
sell to a necromancer.


Sincerely,

Mortifer - MoltenLava

AKA - Eloric D'Mortifer - Necromancer Rank 8
- Veneficus - Magician Rank 5
- Mortifer - Wizard Rank 3
